faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Can I structure my assets through a free zone company?
items.answer: Yes, structuring your assets as a Free Zone company can provide you with numerous benefits, including 100% foreign ownership, 0% income and inheritance tax, and simplified succession planning.

items.question: How does asset protection assist in business succession planning?
items.answer: Through asset protection planning, ultra-high-net-worth and high-net-worth individuals ensure the smooth transition of business ownership. Our experts offer tailored asset security solutions to protect your wealth against creditors and legal disputes.

items.question: How can trusts or foundations be used for asset protection?
items.answer: Trusts can protect your assets by placing all your investment under a trustee, whereas foundations offer unmatched confidentiality, safeguarding your wealth against potential claims.

items.question: Does One Nexuz offer digital asset protection services?
items.answer: Yes, our seasoned consultants offer asset protection solutions for digital and tangible assets.

items.question: How does structuring your assets ensure compliance with the UAE’s Shariah law?
items.answer: Proper asset structuring ensures your wealth is distributed per the Shariah law without incurring losses.
